definition: ownership of the means of production (in Marxism)/system of ownership
actually/place/classifier for houses, small buildings, institutions etc/that which/particle introducing a relative clause or passive/CL:個|个[ge4]
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]

sentences.english: Individuals taking ownership of their own enablement.
sentences.chinese: 他们自己实施的个人所有制。

sentences.english: The right-hand pane is where all the work is done.
sentences.chinese: 右边显示的是所有制作好的图标。

sentences.english: The reciprocation lies in the ownership and professional systems.
sentences.chinese: 组织的所有制和行业性质存在交互作用。

sentences.english: Category of system of ownership of the whole people and market economy category are antipathic .
sentences.chinese: 全民所有制范畴与市场经济范畴是不相容的。

sentences.english: Article 2 This Law is applicable to State enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 第二条本法适用于全民所有制企业。

sentences.english: The Paris Commune is the social rudiments to practice Marx's theory of "rebuilding the individual ownership".
sentences.chinese: 巴黎公社是马克思的“重建个人所有制”的社会雏形。

sentences.english: The American economy is organized in single-owner businesses, partnerships and corporations.
sentences.chinese: 美国经济的组织方式是个人所有制，合伙制和公司制。

sentences.english: Land private ownership was dominant in the Jinjue State.
sentences.chinese: 土地私有是精绝国土地所有制的主要形式。

sentences.english: Therefore, an alternative ownership institution should be the ownership of farming land by the owner-peasant.
sentences.chinese: 因此，可供选择的农地制度应该是自耕农所有制。

sentences.english: The exploration of socialist ownership composition by the Party since the foundation of the China can be divided into four stages.
sentences.chinese: 建国以来党对社会主义所有制结构的探索分四个阶段。

sentences.english: The collectively-owned sector is an important component of the public sector of the economy.
sentences.chinese: 集体所有制经济是公有制经济的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: Adhere to the ownership structure dominated by public ownership.
sentences.chinese: 坚持公有制为主导的所有制结构。

sentences.english: Abundant supplies and the relations of production under individual ownership are utterly incompatible with each other.
sentences.chinese: 个体所有制的生产关系与大量供应是完全冲突的。

sentences.english: The ownership structure was further readjusted and improved.
sentences.chinese: 所有制结构进一步调整和完善。

sentences.english: Ownership is the basis of productive relationship.
sentences.chinese: 所有制是生产关系的基础。

sentences.english: The state sector of the economy is a socialist sector, owned by the whole people.
sentences.chinese: 国营经济是全民所有制的社会主义经济。

definition: relations between levels of production/socio-economic relations
to nationalize/to take over as communal property
